column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Korra says : " Hey ! "
#Text=Tenzin says : " I came as fast as I could .
#Text=These knuckleheads wo n't tell me anything .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I 'll take care of this .
#Text=Saikhan , a word please .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " Councilman Tenzin , I 'm pretty swamped at the moment .
#Text=Can this wait ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " No , it can not .
#Text=Three of Avatar Korra 's friends were wrongly arrested tonight .
#Text=I 'd like you to release them immediately .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " They 're not going anywhere .
#Text=They were interfering with police business .
#Text=" Korra says : " Your so called police business was rounding up innocent people and claiming they were Equalists .
#Text=They should be released , too .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " All Equalists suspects are being detained indefinitely .
#Text=They 'll be freed if and when the task force deems they are no longer a threat .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Those people are entitled to due process under the law .
#Text=" Saikhan says : " You 'll have to take that up with Councilman Tarrlok .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Oh , I plan to .
#Text=At the council meeting , first thing in the morning .
#Text=" Korra says : " You 're officially the worst Chief of Police ever !
#Text=" Tenzin says : " Calm down , Korra .
#Text=I 'll get this sorted out , we just need to be patient .
#Text=But you really are the worst !
#Text=Ever !
#Text="
